Playtex Products revenue = $3.4 | Billion (2007)[http://finance.google.com/finance?q=Energizer Google | Finance] operating_income = $434 Million (2007) net_income = $321 Million (2007) assets = $3.5 Billion (2007) equity = $654 Million (2007) homepage = | [http://energizerholdings.com/Pages/default.aspx Energizer Holdings] }} 'Energizer Holdings' is an American manufacturer of batteries and personal care products, headquartered in Town and Country, Missouri."[http://www.energizer.com/Pages/enr- contact.aspx Contact Energizer]." Energizer Holdings. Retrieved on August 18, 2009."[http://www.town-and-country.org/uploads/ZONING%20MAP.pdf Zoning Map]." City of Town and Country. Retrieved on August 18, 2009."[http://factfinder.census.gov/servlet/MapItDrawServlet?geo_id=16000US2973618&- _bucket_id=50&tree_id=420&context=saff&_lang=en&_sse=on Town and Country city]." U.S. Census Bureau. Retrieved on August 18, 2009.Volkmann, Kelsey. "[http://stlouis.bizjournals.com/stlouis/stories/2009/07/27/daily21.html Energizer to cut jobs as sales slump]." [[St. Louis Business Journal]]. Tuesday July 28, 2009. Retrieved on August 18, 2009. Its most well known brands are Energizer and [[Eveready Battery Company|Eveready]] batteries, [[Schick (razors)|Schick]], [[Wilkinson Sword]] and [[Edge (shaving gel)|Edge]] shaving products, [[Playtex]] feminine hygiene and baby products, and [[Hawaiian Tropic]] and Banana Boat sunscreen products. The company sells in over 165 countries.2006 Annual Report, pg. 5
